name: Ember Ushi! Idol Incognito!
description:
Ember🐮Ushi has stumbled onto the stage of a Mysterious Masked Idol Group!

Match their dance to blend in!

WASD or ⬆⬇⬅➡ to play!

Big thank you to Boki Boki Pixel Art for the game over and win graphics!
This was made over a weekend for the #VTGameJam2022 Hosted by Lua Lucky!

Hopefully you can have a fun time with it!
